channel.title: Conferences on OSLC - Open Services for Lifecycle Collaboration

item.title: OSLC at IBM InterConnect 2015
item.description: Coming in a couple weeks is IBM’s new InterConnect conference which brings together past IBM events (Innovate, Pulse, Impact) into one. These conferences often contain a number of sessions and events with OSLC connect. As you are building your agenda for the conference, I wanted to highlight my sample agenda which has some key sessions that either talking directly about OSLC activities or other topics that are key to OSLC activities.
